CustomField.description: Allocation email text end for template
CustomField.formula:
"Expected Repayment Date : " + text( Expected_Payment_Date__c ) + br()+ "Expected Investment Term : " + text( Start_Date_Due_Date__c ) + " days" + br()+ "Credit Insurer : " + text( Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Buyer__r.Insured_by__c ) + br() +
"Number of outstanding invoices overdue from 15 to 29 days: " + text(Buyer_other_Overdue_15_29__c) + br() + "Number of invoices paid back all time: " + text(Buyer_number_invoice_paid_back_all_time__c)+ br()+
"Please check the invoice's information through the following link:" + br() + "https://marketplace.incomlend.com/#/app/invoice-detail/marketplace/" + Marketplace_link__c + "/" + Id + " " + br() + br()+ br()
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allocation email text end for template
CustomField.label: Allocation email text end
